# @param {Integer[]} max_heights
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_sum_of_heights(max_heights)
  n = max_heights.size
  max_sum = 0
  
  # Iterate over each position as a potential peak
  (0...n).each do |peak|
    sum = max_heights[peak]
    left_max = max_heights[peak]
    right_max = max_heights[peak]

    # Calculate sum on the left side of the peak
    (peak-1).downto(0) do |i|
      left_max = [left_max-1, max_heights[i]].min
      sum += left_max
    end

    # Calculate sum on the right side of the peak
    (peak+1...n).each do |i|
      right_max = [right_max-1, max_heights[i]].min
      sum += right_max
    end

    # Update max_sum if this peak results in a higher sum
    max_sum = [max_sum, sum].max
  end
  
  max_sum
end
